attributes.review: do not buy this app! it is so horrible that i am listening to happy by dixie damelio to try and make me feel better. ᗷᑌᕼᗴᗴᔕ😁 sometimes 👊 I😺 don’t👻 wanna🤢 be🐝 happy😝! i am truly in disgust with how poorly this app was made. it makes me feel like i am on the dark web because when i opened the app MoMo and debby ryan were looking at me and it made me very uncomfortable 😣 you know you love me 😍 xoxoxoxoxoxox - gossip girl 😝💋💋💄

attributes.review: Apple store please remove this app. I have been waiting for this app to download for a week straight and now that I have it my family disappeared and i can't get them back unless i vote for trump. sad. also all of my pictures have deleted off my phone and have been posted on tiktok. i feel violated. it won't let me delete the app so here i am writing a review. 10/10 WOULD NOT recommend this app. thanks girlies💖🧚✨
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: Blehhhh, where do I even start?!🤮This app finally downloaded after a MILLENNIUM! So I tap on it to open it and it legit makes my phone explode🙀💥So I have to sell all my Donald Trump merch on EBay to get enough money to buy new phone ugh😢I download app again, another millennium passes, and BOOM...phone explodes again😔So then I had to sell my 600 pound pig (named after our beloved Trump of course) on EBay to get this phone😢I think you owe me an apology Donald Trump and 3 phones🤢
attributes.title: SO DISAPPOINTED

attributes.review: I am giving this app a 1-star rating because it is very difficult to use. I am unhappy with the interface that is presented to me upon opening it. Additionally, this app does not give us the correct information we need to stay informed on the issues we face as a nation. I am extremely disappointed with this app, and hope that it will be removed from the App Store. Thank you.
attributes.title: Poor Quality App

attributes.review: This app is horrendous it took me a month to download. Once it finally downloaded it my phone kept dying and my battery health went all the way down😨. The next day the cops came to my front door and tried to arrest me. They threatened me to vote for Trump. Good thing they didn’t have a warrant. I shooed them away and then deleted the app. It says the app tracks your location in the background and “might reduce phone battery”.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: When I logged in it was glitchy and It asked me for my phone number and I couldn’t skip it. I didn’t want put my phone number  and then I hear Donald trump screaming in the background and it hurt my ears. You should delet the audio and the game. Because it’s so bad, It’s so glitchy I could type in my phone number, because the background was so loud, so bad. 🤢🤮

attributes.review: I tried to download this app to show support for my country and my president. However I was HORRIBLY mistreated. The app activated my front facing camera without asking first, figured out my race and proceeded to call me all sorts of racial slurs. At first I didn’t think much of it until I started to use the app and it replaced all the words with pictures because “N****rs don’t know how to read”. Worst app ever. 0/10 would not recommend. THIS IS NOT A JOKE OR A SCAM!!! 420 BLAZE IT 🔥🔥🔥
attributes.title: WORST. APP. EVER.

attributes.review: This app makes me wanna cry 😭 it made my phone glitch out so much it hurts to hold 😭 I don’t even wanna look at my phone anymore ! It’s so bad I couldn’t even sign in it just showed me a picture of trump with a evil scary grin and he in white or red like letters it wrote “ jOin The tRumpAnzEsss” and I am crying 😭 I deleted the app so fast WHEN I GOT THE CHANCE I WAS CRYING FOR 4 HOURS then my phone screen changed so weirdly it changed to trump 2020 like a culT- I could actually never 😔
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: A rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate places Remy in the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Despite the apparent dangers of being an unlikely - and certainly unwanted - visitor in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant, Remy's passion for cooking soon sets into motion a hilarious and exciting rat race that turns the culinary world of Paris upside down.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP. DESERVES 0 STARS

attributes.review: Yea I haven’t gotten any weird dreams like y’all libtards, this app took 2 min to download i don’t know if y’all can’t read time but this only took 2 min for me. Probably get a nee phone you most likely have a iPhone 3
